function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE

results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential transmission of mycobacterium tuberculosis in the built environment due to its stability in air and low infectious dose","category":"Healthcare results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 and 2 deaths attributed primarily to airborne transmission","category":"Failure to implement preventive
